Name: Ludun
Alliance: Tiancuo wucun (Tangcuo five village ritual alliance)

Raw.Settlement: Ludun village belongs to the Lindun administrative village 林墩行政村. The village population is over 200 people.
Raw.Village_Temples: Tudimiao 土地庙 is dedicated to Fude zhengshen 福德正神.

Rituals.Processions: On 1/16 the villagers go to the Xinxingshê 新兴社 to present incense 进香.
Rituals.Birthday: 6/6: The celebration of Fude zhengshen 福德正神 is held with two days of opera. 8/23: The celebration of Tiangong yuanshuai 田公元帅 is held together with Weicuo 尾厝, and one day of opera is performed. 5. Ritual Groups Each year Fushou 福首 are selected on the basis of age.
